items.content_html: This project is a simple and user-friendly currency converter built for the web. It allows users to convert between different currencies, providing real-time exchange rates. The frontend is developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it lightweight and easy to integrate into any web application.
items.title: Vaishnavi1047/Currency-Converter: This project is a simple and user-friendly currency converter built for the web. It allows users to convert between different currencies, providing real-time exchange rates. The frontend is developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, making it lightweight and easy to integrate into any web application.

items.content_html: Chainadres is a lightweight and secure wallet sender app designed for sending transactions on blockchain networks. This application simplifies the process of initiating transactions by providing an intuitive interface to interact with blockchain wallets.
items.title: criptichood/chainadres: Chainadres is a lightweight and secure wallet sender app designed for sending transactions on blockchain networks. This application simplifies the process of initiating transactions by providing an intuitive interface to interact with blockchain wallets.

items.content_html: Codeial is a lightweight social media web application for coders built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It provides basic features for user authentication, publishing, deleting posts and comments, and editing profile information. This project serves as a simple demonstration of these functionalities.
items.title: krishnashah122/Codeial: Codeial is a lightweight social media web application for coders built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It provides basic features for user authentication, publishing, deleting posts and comments, and editing profile information. This project serves as a simple demonstration of these functionalities.

items.content_html: Fiscal Data Package is a lightweight and user-oriented format for publishing and consuming fiscal data. Fiscal data packages are made of simple and universal components. They can be produced from ordinary spreadsheet software and used in any environment.
items.title: frictionlessdata/datapackage-fiscal: Fiscal Data Package is a lightweight and user-oriented format for publishing and consuming fiscal data. Fiscal data packages are made of simple and universal components. They can be produced from ordinary spreadsheet software and used in any environment.
